item.title: How Karate Kid: Legends Continues 1 Key Franchise Trademark For Ralph Macchio Explained: "I Think Will Pay Off In Dividends"
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Ralph Macchio discusses his return in Karate Kid: Legends, sharing how he stays true to Daniel LaRusso's spirit & Miyagi's legacy.

item.title: Mission: Impossible 8 Title Confirmed, Teases The End Of Ethan Hunt Against Tom Cruise's Reported Wishes
item.description: The title for Mission: Impossible 8 has finally been revealed, and it teases that the film will be the final mission for Tom Cruise’s Ethan Hunt.

item.title: Mary Elizabeth Winstead’s 3-Year-Old Action-Revenge Movie Proves How Much The DC Universe Wasted Her
item.description: Kate is one of Mary Elizabeth Winstead’s most underrated movies, and it proves an important point about her role in DC’s Birds of Prey movie.
